mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADING VALUES ( seq_trading.nextVal, #{p_idx}, #{p_image_s}, #{p_name}, #{buyer_id}, #{buyer_hopeprice}, #{seller_id}, #{seller_hopeprice}, '대기', TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd am hh24:mi') )
mapper.select: SELECT BUYER_ID, BUYER_HOPEPRICE FROM TRADING WHERE P_IDX = #{p_idx} AND T_STATUS ='대기' ORDER BY BUYER_HOPEPRICE DESC
SELECT * FROM TRADING WHERE SELLER_ID = #{seller_id} AND (T_STATUS = #{w1} OR T_STATUS = #{w2}) ORDER BY T_STATUS DESC
SELECT * FROM TRADING WHERE BUYER_ID = #{buyer_id} AND (T_STATUS = #{w1} OR T_STATUS = #{w2} OR T_STATUS = #{w3}) ORDER BY T_STATUS DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TRADING SET T_STATUS = '입금대기' WHERE P_IDX = #{p_idx} AND BUYER_ID = #{buyer_id}
UPDATE TRADING SET T_STATUS = '미체결' WHERE P_IDX = #{p_idx} AND BUYER_ID != #{buyer_id}
UPDATE TRADING SET T_STATUS = '완료' WHERE P_IDX = #{p_idx} AND BUYER_ID = #{buyer_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TRADING WHERE P_IDX = #{p_idx} AND BUYER_ID = #{buyer_id}
